name: Modern Ops Warfare - War games
description:
Step on to the modern battlefield in this new FPS game, where you go behind the enemy lines to take down bad guys at their own turf.

Featuring missions for all the various weapon classes, make use of the modern weapons and guns to shoot down all the enemies in your way.

Modern Ops Warfare purely focuses on bringing the shooting action to your smartphone, with top of the line 3D graphics and real time physics.

So lock and load, and get ready to hit the front lines, Soldier!
